text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, cun zanoni mū'mine, ki muhoçirat (tarki Vatan) kardaand, ʙa nazdaton ojand, onhoro ʙisançed. Xudo ʙa imonaşon donotar ast. Pas agar donisted, ki imon ovardaand, nazdi kofiron ʙozaşon nagardoned. Zero inho ʙar mardoni kofir halol nestand va mardoni kofir niz ʙar onho halol nestand. Va har cī on kofiron ʙaroi in guna zanon nafaqa kardaand, ʙipardozed. Va agar onhoro nikoh kuned va mahraşonro ʙidihed, gunohe nakardaed. Va zanoni kofiri xudro nigoh nadored. Va har cī nafaqa kardaed, az mardoni kofir ʙixohed va onho niz har cī xazina (nafaqa) kardaand, az şumo ʙixohand. In hukmi Xudost. Xudo mijoni şumo hukm mekunad, va Ū donovu hakim ast
